title: Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 weeks. I interviewed at Crosswinds (Cocoa, FL) in May 2019
Interview Descriptions: They gave me the application to fill out and then began the interview. It was a straight forward social work interview inquiring about the theories I use and my experience.
Interview Questions: What kind of supervision do you prefer?

title: Server Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Crosswinds (Burlington, ON) in Mar 2019
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was very fast (only about 15-20 mins) with two hiring managers. Overall, was a simple, easy, basic question, and straightforward process. Have to have references in which they aks about after the interview process
Interview Questions:
Tell me about yourself
why do you want to work here

title: Account Executive Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Crosswinds (Austin, TX) in Sept 2014
Interview Descriptions:
unstructured, flexible, informal
Team was great, they made me feel very comfortable and the interview was more of a conversation than an interview. Team was great, I enjoyed meeting with them.
Interview Questions: How would you handle the following situations:
